labels.name: P2: Fix can wait a while

data.actual_result: The "New Messages" divider won't have red lines on either side of it.
data.expected_result: The "New Messages" divider that shows up over the new messages will have red lines on both sides of it.
data.short_description: The red line that shows up on both sides of 'New Messages" doesn't show up if you change scaling.
data.steps_to_repro: - In the Discord Canary app, hold control and press "-" (minus) - Have someone say something in a guild channel while you are tabbed into a different guild or text channel
